DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study was to assess the steady-state pharmacokinetics (PK) of efavirenz (EFV) in human immunodeficiency virus type 1 (HIV-1) infected subjects on stable antiretroviral regimens containing EFV, and having selected degrees of hepatic impairment or normal hepatic function.
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics of Efavirenz in HIV-1 Infected Subjects With Hepatic Impairment
DOC.criteria: HIV1 infection with or without Hepatitis B or C infection Stable antiretroviral regimen containing efavirenz and nucleoside/nucleotide reverse transcriptase inhibitors (NRTI) for at least 1 month Mild, moderate or severe hepatic impairment with hepatic cirrhosis Acute flare of hepatitis Positive pregnancy test for a female Significant acute medical illness in past 2 months Use of agents known to significantly affect liver metabolism Change in medications to treat a chronic disease in the past 2 months
